trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for objects, such as points and rectangles.
This is an abstract class.
A transform defines how to map points from one coordinate space into another coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Una trasformazione definisce la modalità di punti da uno spazio di coordinate della mappa in un altro spazio delle coordinate.

trans-unit.source: They can be used to produce effects such as rotation, scaling, and skewing.
trans-unit.target: Possono essere utilizzati per produrre effetti ad esempio la rotazione, ridimensionamento e inclinazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> class.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Gets the inverse transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />, if possible.
An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Inverso di questa istanza, se possibile. in caso contrario <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
-or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
Creates a string representation of this instance.
Creates a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform" />.
A string representation of this instance.
<see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> instance used to process this instance.
Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> parameter.
A string representation of this instance, based on <paramref name="provider" />.
The point to transform.
Transforms the specified point and returns the result.
The result of transforming <paramref name="point" />.
The transform did not succeed.
The bounding box to transform.
When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
The smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains the transformed <paramref name="rect" />.
The point to transform.
The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A> (metodo), questo metodo non genera un'eccezione se la trasformazione ha esito negativo.
